description: Designed and implemented complete admin dashboard from scratch for agricultural marketplace platform. Built real-time notification and feedback systems with role-based access control.
responsibilities: Developed comprehensive admin panel with React 19 and Material-UI
Integrated Firebase services for backend infrastructure (Firestore, Authentication, Storage)
Created user management system for farmers and buyers with real-time updates
Implemented role-based access control for Super Admin and Admin users
Built responsive UI following Material Design guidelines
Handled CORS configuration for cloud storage and database seeding
